Spring's database support defines this exception.

Convert a predefined exception to an HTTP Status code and specify the name of a specific view that will be used to display the error.

Convert a predefined exception to an HTTP Status code and specify the name of a specific view that will be used to display the error.

demo.config - package demo.config
Spring Configuration files
demo.example - package demo.example
Example classes not used in the application that you might find them useful in your own project.
demo.exceptions - package demo.exceptions
The exceptions used by the demo.
demo.main - package demo.main
Main entry point for Application plus available profiles.
demo.utils - package demo.utils
 
demo.web - package demo.web
Web artifacts used by all three demos.
demo1.web - package demo1.web
Artifacts used by Demo 1 - a Controller that handles its own exceptions.
demo2.web - package demo2.web
Artifacts used by Demo 2 - a Controller that relies on a global Controller Advice to handle its exceptions.
demo3.config - package demo3.config
Configuration for demonstrating the use of the SimpleMappingExceptionResolver.
demo3.web - package demo3.web
Artifacts used by Demo 3 - a Controller that relies on a Simple Mapping Exception Resolver to handle its exceptions.
demo4() - Method in class demo.web.ViewMappingController
 
demo5.web - package demo5.web
Controller that demos exception handling using Spring Boot's internal setup.
DEMO_CONFIG_PROFILE - Static variable in interface demo.main.Profiles
DEMO mode configuration property - see DemoExceptionConfiguration.
DemoException(ReturnOrRedirectController.Action) - Constructor for exception demo5.web.ReturnOrRedirectController.DemoException
 
DemoExceptionConfiguration - Class in demo3.config
Setup for exception handling using a SimpleMappingExceptionResolver sub-class that can be enabled or disabled programmatically.
DemoExceptionConfiguration() - Constructor for class demo3.config.DemoExceptionConfiguration
 
doResolveException(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Object, Exception) - Method in class demo.example.ExampleSimpleMappingExceptionResolver
This method uses the older API and gets passed the handler (typically the @Controller) that generated the exception.
doResolveHandlerMethodException(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, HandlerMethod, Exception) - Method in class demo.example.ExampleExceptionHandlerExceptionResolver
This method uses the newee API and gets passed the handler-method (typically the method on the @Controller) that generated the exception.
